Package org.springframework.test.web

@NullMarked package org.springframework.test.web
Helper classes for unit tests based on Spring's web support.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.springframework.test.web.client
    Contains client-side REST testing support.
    org.springframework.test.web.servlet
    Contains server-side support for testing Spring MVC applications.
    org.springframework.test.web.support
    Support classes for testing web applications.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ModelAndViewAssert
    A collection of assertions intended to simplify testing scenarios dealing with Spring Web MVC ModelAndView objects.
    UriAssert
    AssertJ assertions that can be applied to a String representing a URI.
